response.overview: The Heavy Music Awards shine a spotlight on artists, producers, venues, festivals and designers whose incredible talent deserves the attention of the wider world. To achieve this, they have a judging panel of several hundred key music industry figures nominating the finalists, before the public votes on the winners. The finalists for this year’s awards were announced at the launch event at Gorilla in Manchester last week, which also featured performances from MILESTONES, LOATHE and COLD YEARS.
response.tagline: The second annual Heavy Music Awards took place at London’s Koko on 23 August 2018, hosted by Sophie K, and featuring live performances by Fever 333, Milk Teeth, Black Peaks and Coldbones.
response.title: Heavy Music Awards 2018
